description:
To be accepted as Yaga`s pupil, Seth must prove his strength as a sorcerer. He asks Melie for help, but attack magic isn`t her strong suit, so she tells him she can`t help... but her worry for Seth causes her personality to take a drastic turn into "Crazy Melie." She teaches Seth the harsh and dangerous lesson that strength can`t be gained unless you`re prepared to die for it, but then things go horribly wrong...
Source: crunchyroll
